text: (Tiniharusamga) tapa'ile bhannus ki timila'i akasa ra jaminabata jivika kasale pradana gardacha va timro kana ra amkhamathi kasako akhtiyari cha ra mrtakabata pranavala kasale bana'umcha ra pranavanabata pranahina kasale gardacha? Ra tyo ko ho jasale sabai kamako yojana bana'umcha? Ta tiniharule avasya bhanne chan ‘‘allaha’’, tasartha bhannus ki tyaso bha'e timi (allahasamga) kina dara mandainau
